Articles.Content:
Salutations!

5 minutes ago, my birthday has arrived upon us!

I am now finally 12.

Yes, I may not be new, but I see birthdays as a new chance at a clean slate of life.

Which also means I can finally say:

I\'M 12 AND WHAT IS THIS.

Hooray!
you are now someplace where you have broken the user agreement. You are supposed to be 13 to be registered here. =P

Congratz on getting a parent/guardian to sign you up!

Happy Bday.
HAHA! im older then you! I was 12 in January

HAHA! im older then you! I was 12 in January

Haha! Im older than you! I was 15 in September of last year. (yes I am parodying you to annoy you).

Also happy birthday Ping111
